titles.title: CB 110 Make Mention That His Name Is Exalted
Isaiah 12:4-6

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion,
Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion,
For great is the Holy One, great is the Holy One of
Israel;
For great is the Holy One, great is the Holy One of
Israel.
